thread.title: Beware
thread.title_full: Beware - Review of Paramount Hotel Times Square New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LeedsPenny
title: Beware
text: Three month after my stay at the paramount hotel I have been charged nearly Â£900 on my credit card!! For the last two days I have left voice mail messages and emails to various departments to enquire what the charges are for and no one has got back to me with a answer. the only charge I had was for breakfast and one evening meal which came to two hundred dollars and that was settled on departure. I have seen other reviews on here with the same problem, let's hope the hotel sees this review and tries to resolve it before I have to take action.
